column4: hi everybody. I'm trying to install a LAMP server on 10.4, but MySQL isn't working. I get this error in webmin: "MySQL is not running on your system - database list could not be  retrieved" any help would be appreciated.
guessing you need to start mysql from that error.
i do - i've tried inputting the following command to no effect: "/etc/init.d/mysql start >/dev/null 2>&1 &"
